rules_text:
Whenever a Skeleton enters under your control, exile the top card of your library. You may play it until end of turn.
Skeletons you control get +1/+0 and and have trample.
flavor_text:
[i]“Despite their lack of blood, I've never seen a creature so hungry to spill it in others.”
— Demonlord Zeramander[/i]
